TriggerOraclev10g.name: c2_autoinsert_problems
TriggerOraclev10g.body: BEGIN<br/> INSERT INTO C2_ENTITIES (ENTITY_ID, VERSION)<br/> VALUES (C2_ENTITIES_SEQ.nextval, 0);<br/> <br/> INSERT INTO C2_ITEMS (ITEM_ID, LABEL)<br/> VALUES (C2_ENTITIES_SEQ.currval, 'PROBLEM#' || to_char(:problem.PROBLEM_ID));<br/><br/> INSERT INTO C2_ITEMS_PROBLEM (ITEM_ID, PROBLEM_ID)<br/> VALUES (C2_ENTITIES_SEQ.currval, :problem.PROBLEM_ID);<br/>END;
